snippet.title: Dr. Langeskov, The Tiger And The Terribly Cursed Emerald: A Whirlwind Heist – Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A 20-minute experimental heist game by Crows Crows Crows featuring Simon Amstell – out now for free on Steam and itch.io.

Free on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/409160
itch.io: http://crowscrowscrows.itch.io/dr-langeskov-the-tiger-and-the-terribly-cursed-emerald-a-whirlwind-heist

We've been working on other things as well – sign up to our mailing list on http://crowscrowscrows.com to be the first to hear about them.
